ai-patthana23.8:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.8:0.3_0: Seeing for the sake of goodness,
ai-patthana23.8:1.1_0: Not seeing the cause, skilled in seeing, or causes and conditions that give rise to vision.
ai-patthana23.8:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.8:2.1_0: Not unskillful qualities should be given up by development, nor by development, be given up by developing the path to the root of the skillful.
ai-patthana23.8:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.8:3.1_0: Not for the sake of developing and cultivating the teaching, they should not give up the cause for the sake of developing and cultivating the reason for the sake of development.
